name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of June 10, Tianjin.
A traffic accident occurred near the intersection of Fangzhen Road and Hangzhou Road, and a bus suddenly rushed towards the crowd.
The video showed that a bus crashed into the roadside, breaking the trees on the side, several injured people lying on the ground, and many cars were damaged, and the scene was in a mess.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The four teachers from Cornell College in the United States who were attacked in Jilin Beishan Park are currently receiving treatment in a nearby hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, a notice about the attack on an American teacher in Beishan Park, Jilin Province, has been circulated online. The notice states that a 55-year-old man surnamed Cui is a major suspect in the crime.
As of the time of posting, the picture has been blocked on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 11, Hu Xijin expressed his views on the attack on an American teacher in Jilin Beishan Park, hoping that it was just an accidental incident.
As the only blogger with the privilege to talk about this news, Hu Xijin's remarks aroused dissatisfaction and condemnation from many patriotic bloggers.
Hu Xijin's Weibo was subsequently deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 5, the China Police Network published an article that an enlarged meeting of the Party Committee of the Ministry of Public Security was held, emphasizing that "the police belong to the Party."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many places in Henan have been experiencing continuous high temperatures, drought and no rain. Farmers are pumping water to irrigate seedlings in the 40-degree high temperature.
A Henan netizen posted that "the 20-meter deep well at home has dried up, the groundwater has dried up, everyone is looking forward to rain, but there is no sign of rain at all"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Official report: The bus driver was detained on the spot, as he lost control of the vehicle due to physical discomfort. The accident caused 1 death and 9 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 11, the Ministry of Civil Affairs reported the incident of "Children's Charity staff defrauding parents of sick children of 10 million yuan".
After investigation, from June to August 2023, Ke Mouxiao privately raised funds from parents of sick children in the name of "Children's Charity 985 Project" and defrauded parents of sick children of nearly 10 million yuan. The Ministry of Civil Affairs suspended the activities of the Children's Charity for three months and included it in the list of social organizations with serious violations of law and dishonesty.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 10, the National Health Commission issued a document: Free blood donation is the health literacy of Chinese citizens.
This triggered ridicule from netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 10, Jia County, Henan. A delivery man parked his car in front of a store when picking up food, which caused dissatisfaction among the store owners, and a dispute broke out between the two parties. The boss then rushed out of the store and chased the delivery man with a U-shaped lock.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 11, Chengdu, Sichuan. Ms. Wang, who lives in Zhonghangcheng Community, Pidu District, reported that on the afternoon of June 9, her 27-year-old daughter Xiaoya was killed in her house by an unknown young woman. The community property security guard was at the scene at the time, but did not stop it immediately. Ms. Wang was very sad about her daughter's unfortunate death, and she hoped that the law would severely punish the murderer. At the same time, she believed that the property security guard should also bear some responsibility for his inaction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 11, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that the attack on an American teacher in Jilin Beishan Park was an isolated incident. The isolated incident will not affect the normal cultural exchanges between China and the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Jilin police report on attack on American teacher at Beishan Park
The report said the motive of the man surnamed Cui was because he collided with a foreigner while walking.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 11, Hunyuan County, Shanxi. The Hengyuanxin Fund Cooperative collapsed, making it impossible for depositors to withdraw their money. Depositors shouted in front of the county government, "Secretary, return the money."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 10, Liaocheng, Shandong. It was reported online that the village committee of Tangyuan Town seized farmland and prevented villagers from farming, and hired social workers to beat up villagers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 11, Luliang, Shanxi. The land of villagers in Fengjiayu Village was forcibly occupied. The villagers held up banners to defend their rights and beg the leaders to return the villagers' land rights.
